TopicTitle: [WIP] Nova's Plernets, a Kopernicus mod dev thread- Stockalike GP2 and GP3!

Articles.Content:
Great! Now we need moons. And bad mspaint diagrams.

Fluff:

![nMt1uwX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/nMt1uwX.jpg)

Mostly featureless, completely white, one big mimas like crater.

Squash:

![fHyTwat.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fHyTwat.jpg)

Big band of ice at equator, otherwise Gilly like brown

Bunt:

![PTS5muN.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PTS5muN.jpg)

The king of bad mspaint diagrams ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif). I still don't know what shade of orange it will be, either. That bright thing is not stockalike.

Got it.

So far, I've created the textures for Bunt and Fluff. When I'm finished with Squash's, I'll upload it to MEGA and PM the link to you.
Well, I really want to see your textures, but... um... I can't get Fluff to work.

Okay... I'll send you new ones for Fluff and Squash, 'cuz they're kinda, sorta, CRAPPY.

Also Bunt, cuz DDS is invisible unless you have DDSViewer, and it takes up more memory.

- - - Updated - - -

Here you go! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[https://mega.co.nz/#!OhtQRThY!rg5R1gMCCa65szXRizVAqz-gfTVgTBCrrpUNWkWg1Mk](https://mega.co.nz/#!OhtQRThY!rg5R1gMCCa65szXRizVAqz-gfTVgTBCrrpUNWkWg1Mk)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-15T21:32:36Z" title="06/15/2015 09:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 15, 2015</time> by Interplanet Janet**
Can I have a beta?
Sorry Augustus, but he hasn't released it yet. However, if you want to, you can help work on this with me and Long.

> 
> Okay... I'll send you new ones for Fluff and Squash, 'cuz they're kinda, sorta, CRAPPY.
> Also Bunt, cuz DDS is invisible unless you have DDSViewer, and it takes up more memory.
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Here you go! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> 
> [https://mega.co.nz/#!OhtQRThY!rg5R1gMCCa65szXRizVAqz-gfTVgTBCrrpUNWkWg1Mk](https://mega.co.nz/#!OhtQRThY!rg5R1gMCCa65szXRizVAqz-gfTVgTBCrrpUNWkWg1Mk)

I like the old ones better, there a bit more stockalike. They still lack detail, though. I might try making my own textures for these. 

I also re-did the rings, since I figured out how to. Your bump maps and normal maps for Fluff and Squash are staying.

I even moved Eeloo and I can't get Fluff to work.

> 
> Beauty shot with new rings:
> 
> ![Qnzcumo.png](http://i.imgur.com/Qnzcumo.png)
> 
> Tracking station pic as of now, will update the OP
> 
> ![2tkwEDD.png](http://i.imgur.com/2tkwEDD.png)
> 
> Beauty shot #2:
> 
> ![XcJsFcm.png](http://i.imgur.com/XcJsFcm.png)
>

>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-15T22:42:33Z" title="06/15/2015 10:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 15, 2015</time> by ThatGuyWithALongUsername**
  
forgot to close spoiler tag

Hope Fluff works sometime in the future; I'd like a preliminary release to try and fix it.

Also, about Bunt... are you changing that texture?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-15T22:46:30Z" title="06/15/2015 10:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 15, 2015</time> by Interplanet Janet**

Yes, it's not stockalike enough. I imagined Bunt to be totally different. And I do kinda like the direction of the first two on the original edit.

- - - Updated - - -

I'm not giving beta stuff to anyone yet. I'm the only developer (unless you count Janet, and his textures), so nope. However, if you can help, Augustus, please do. You have a good notion of stockalike design.

Oh, I see.

Also, would it be okay if I made the Thread for the Mod after Alpha 1 is released?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-15T23:43:00Z" title="06/15/2015 11:43  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 15, 2015</time> by Interplanet Janet**
I could probably help with this. Give me all the files and I should be able to figure all this out and make some improvements.

> 
> No, but you don't make release threads until the mod is fully released, right? That's how I'm probably gonna do it.
> Can anyone tell me why this config for Fluff doesn't work and how to fix it? I did edit the example from Kopernicus.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>

> Sorry Augustus, I wasn't saying no to you, lease help out...

 Adding a template (Do Moho) should fix it.
Also remove the atmo and temp curve.

And to think we don't get preliminary mods yet.

If you send us some, I'll make a little "tweak" to Fluff.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-16T01:14:01Z" title="06/16/2015 01:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 16, 2015</time> by Interplanet Janet**
Ok, when I have time, I'll update the OP, make Fluff work, add contributors to the OP, and give the contributors a dev copy. Sorry, I'm new at modding, and mod management.
Sure. Besides, the new Kopernicus is out.

> 
> Sure. Besides, the new Kopernicus is out.

Wait, what? \*checks Kopernicus thread\* oh hey! Yeah, I'll use that.

check the log file generated by kopernicus its in the logs folder, it'll tell you why it's not showing up....btw you don't need an atmosphere section if it's a vacuum planet ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I updated the OP as well, contributors are now on there, and the "future plans" is now a color-coded checklist.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> check the log file generated by kopernicus its in the logs folder, it'll tell you why it's not showing up....btw you don't need an atmosphere section if it's a vacuum planet ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

    //=============================================================================================================////=====  Kopernicus 0.0.9 - (BuildDate: 15.06.2015 17:37:57; AssemblyHash: DixZ/hc1EVGE1wmsTcoV6AVcOHc=)  =====////=============================================================================================================//[LOG 08:09:37]: Logger "Kopernicus" was created[LOG 08:09:37]: Injector.OnDestroy(): Complete[LOG 08:09:37]: Running namechange pass.[LOG 08:09:37]: [Kopernicus]: RuntimeUtility Started[LOG 08:09:37]: StarLightSwitcher.Awake(): Begin

the log says it all:

    [LOG 07:50:41]: Exception Was Recorded: The requested value 'VacuumOptimized' was not found.

there isn't a VacuumOptimised setting in teh game, change it to something thats actually in the game and it'll work ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

oh and those biomes are from the template, it'll use the template's biome map, so don't get too excited
